trans-unit.source: Represents a <see langword="<saml:Action>" /> element defined by SAML 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 代表 SAML 2.0 定義 <see langword="<saml:Action>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action> class specifies an action on a resource for which authorization is either requested, granted, or denied in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action>類別資源的授權要求、 授與或拒絕在上指定的動作<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement> represents a claim about the ability of the subject of a SAML 2 assertion to perform a specified set of actions on a specified resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement>表示 SAML 2 判斷提示的主體在指定的資源上執行一組指定的動作的能力有關的宣告。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action> can be added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement.Actions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify the desired action.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action>可以加入至<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement.Actions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來指定所要的動作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action.Value%2A> property represents the action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action.Namespace%2A> property specifies the XML namespace in which the action is defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action.Value%2A>屬性表示動作和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action.Namespace%2A>屬性指定的動作已定義的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specifies the resource on which the access decision applies, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement.Decision%2A> property specifies the access decision.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會指定的資源所在適用於存取決策，而<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement.Decision%2A>屬性會指定存取決策。

trans-unit.source: The action that is to be performed.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: The URI that represents the namespace in which the name of the specified action is to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 代表命名空間的 URI，其中指定的動作名稱要進行解譯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action" /> class with the specified namespace and action.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的命名空間和動作，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Action" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="actionNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="actionNamespace" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="actionNamespace" /> is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="actionNamespace" /> 不是絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI reference that represents the XML namespace in which the name of the specified action is to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定代表 XML 命名空間的 URI 參考，其中指定的動作名稱要進行解譯。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 表示命名空間的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Namespace` attribute of the `<saml:Action>` element.
trans-unit.target: `Namespace` 元素的 `<saml:Action>` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is required.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要屬性。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a value that is not an absolute URI occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生設定並非絕對 URI 之值的嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that the subject of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> can perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> 的主體能夠對資源執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: The action that the subject of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> can perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> 的主體能夠對資源執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `<saml:Action>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<saml:Action>` 項目值。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a value that is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生設定 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串之值的嘗試。
